title: [Concourse, North]
description: Rows of planters line the concourse, each brimming with brightly colored plants surrounded by broad leaves, while elegant brass sconces cast a soothing light upon the smooth, onyx-swirled white marble floors and walls.  A carved arch rests next to a frosted window proclaiming "Bespoke Tailors," which is opposite a curved arch next to a plaque that ascribes its entry to "Ever After Boutique."
